ns0:Resource.title: VIKING - VISTA Kilo-degree Infrared Galaxy survey Data Release 2

curation.publisher: WFAU, Institute for Astronomy, University of Edinburgh

creator.name: WFAU, Institute for Astronomy, University of Edinburgh

content.subject: Infrared, survey, galaxy, KIDS
content.description: The VIKING survey is the VISTA counterpart to the VST KIDS survey. The KIDS survey will cover 1500 deg^2 in u,g,r,i divided in two stripes (NGP, centred on equator ; SGP, centred on Dec = -30). The matching VISTA survey will cover (almost) all of these stripes in Z,Y,J,H, Ks with ~ 400s exposures per band.

capability.description: Access to two applications: general ADQL query, and asynchronous cone-search where relevant/enabled.
